ComicInfo.Title: Finding Belle; The Carousel; The Beagle Has Landed Charlie Brown
ComicInfo.Summary:
After years without contact, Snoopy begins the journey of a lifetime, traveling through Kansas City in search of his beloved sister, Belle. “Finding Belle” and many more adventures await you within this month’s issue of PEANUTS.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Iain R. Morris (d, c) | 1 | RE | BOOM! Studios "It Was a Dark and Stormy Night" Exclusive Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | Missing | RE | San Diego Comic-Con "Belle" Exclusive Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a), Emily Chang (d) & Jillian Crab (d) | Missing |
